author: Corridor Crew
description:
Tim Miller, creator and producer of Love, Death & Robots, talks with Wren and Sam about the Red Hot Chili Peppers music video that opened Vol 4 of the series. This episode kickstarted some fan hate, with many expressing disappointment about the short not carrying a story or a twist, which they were expecting.

What were your thoughts after watching it?
title: nO sToRy In A mUsIc ViDeO?!
